description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Madagascar, Past, Present, and Future; the aggression of the French and the revival of the slave trade. Being the subject matter of two lectures given before the Balloon Society of Great Britain ... on September 9th, 1892, and May 26th, 1893. [With illustrations.]" Author: DAWSON, E. W. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010097.f.2." Page: 78 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: John Haddon & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000882845 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
